post.subject: Character Event Warp: "Let Scent Sink In" & "Sunset Clause"
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/09/27/353536228f7a7b885acc6a936a5549fb_877231095189765447.jpg"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"261344"}},{"insert":"
Hello, Trailblazers!
Character Event Warp Period for this phase is 2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/22 15:00:00 (server time), and includes the following content:

▌Character Event Warp: Let Scent Sink In"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Lingsha (Abundance: Fire) and 4-star characters Misha (Destruction: Ice), Natasha (Abundance: Physical), and Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire) will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/22 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Lingsha (Abundance: Fire)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Misha (Destruction: Ice)
Natasha (Abundance: Physical)
Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire)

▌Character Event Warp: Sunset Clause"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Topaz & Numby (The Hunt: Fire) and 4-star characters Misha (Destruction: Ice), Natasha (Abundance: Physical), and Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire) will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/22 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Topaz & Numby (The Hunt: Fire)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Misha (Destruction: Ice)
Natasha (Abundance: Physical)
Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire)

※ Among the above characters, the limited character will not be available in the Stellar Warp event.
※ During the event, the limited 5-star character Lingsha (Abundance: Fire) can only be obtained from Character Event Warp Let Scent Sink In while the limited 5-star character Topaz & Numby (The Hunt: Fire) can only be obtained from Character Event Warp Sunset Clause.
※ This Warp is considered a Character Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star character in any Character Event Warp will always be carried over to other Character Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.

▌Temporary Early Access for Material Stages"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Event Period: 2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/29 15:00:00 (server time)
●Event Details: During the event period, Ascension and Trace Material stages for Lingsha (Abundance: Fire) and Topaz & Numby (The Hunt: Fire) will be made prematurely available. If Trailblazers haven't unlocked these stages, they can use the "Interastral Peace Guide - Survival Index" to challenge the stages directly.
●Stagnant Shadows, Calyxes (Crimson), and Echo of War stages corresponding to the characters above will be available in this phase.
※ The Echo of War stage corresponding to the character Lingsha (Abundance: Fire) is not available for early access.

▌Character Trial Event: Aptitude Showcase"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Requirements: Unlock Travel Log
●Event Period: 2024/10/02 12:00:00 – 2024/10/22 15:00:00 (server time)
●Event Details: Trial characters Lingsha (Abundance: Fire), Topaz & Numby (The Hunt: Fire), Misha (Destruction: Ice), Natasha (Abundance: Physical), and Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire) can be used to experience the stage. Upon completing the challenge, Trailblazers can obtain Stellar Jades, Adventure Logs, Universal Enhancement Materials, and credits.
"}]
